title: Pixel Piracy 4.2.2
description:
Pixel Piracy is a side-scrolling 2d, real time strategy/sandbox/simulation game created by indie developer Vitali Kirpu and produced by Alexander Poysky. In the game, the player leads the life of a pirate captain. Recruit a crew, outfit and customize your ship and set sail on the open seas.


How to play
~~~~~~~~~~~
1. Open the folder
2. Execute the application
3. Play

Notes
~~~~~
The file is a lot smaller than the older version because I removed the _CommonRedist folder which is around 90mb.

*If you guys want to get more updates, just seed.
*Also, if you like the game, consider buying it to support the developers.


-Happy Holidays! Argh!
